thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 40 of 3495
thread.title: Cheryl

author: Cheryl
title: Cheryl
text:
- The website lets me search for the edition I prefer.
- If my choice is out of stock, the "wishlist" feature works quite well.
- If my purchase total exceeds $10, shipping is free, so I usually order 3 books at a time. They send books to shipping without delay, so books shipped free arrive quickly, especially if I order them on a Monday or Tuesday.
- I've always gotten books in great condition â€“ never any mildew smell. Books marked merely "good," are often like new, especially hardbacks.
